title: Enhanced plasmid-mediated conjugative transfer of resistance genes across bacterial species promoted by graphene oxide
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,831-845
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00951C, Paper
Siyu Zhang, Jin Fang, Huijun Liu, Zhiheng Li, Lijuan Liu, Shaoting Du
We analyzed the plasmid-mediated transfer frequency between Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria at different GO concentrations to unveil its impact on conjugative transfer of ARGs.
